description: Privacy configuration for car navigation systems comparing Apple Maps, Google Maps, and OpenStreetMap

dataTypes.name: Coarse Location
dataTypes.description: Approximate location at city or region level

dataTypes.name: Heading
dataTypes.description: Direction of movement or device orientation in degrees

dataTypes.name: Altitude
dataTypes.description: Height above sea level measured in meters or feet

dataTypes.name: Current Speed
dataTypes.description: Real-time speed of the user or device

dataTypes.name: Route Origin
dataTypes.description: Starting point location of a route

dataTypes.name: Route Destination
dataTypes.description: Final endpoint location of a route

dataTypes.name: Route Waypoints
dataTypes.description: Intermediate stops or checkpoints along a route

dataTypes.name: Search History
dataTypes.description: Record of previous searches performed by the user

dataTypes.name: Visited Places
dataTypes.description: Locations previously visited by the user or device

dataTypes.name: Traffic Data
dataTypes.description: Information about road conditions, congestion, and incidents

dataTypes.name: Point of Interest Interactions
dataTypes.description: User interactions with saved or viewed places and landmarks

dataTypes.name: Device Identifier
dataTypes.description: Unique identifier associated with a user's device

dataTypes.name: User Profile
dataTypes.description: Personal and preference information associated with a user account

dataTypes.name: Timestamp Data
dataTypes.description: Date and time information associated with collected events

contexts.name: Incognito/Private Mode
contexts.description: Privacy mode enabled in navigation app

retentionPeriods.name: 24 Hours
retentionPeriods.description: Data stored for 24 hours then deleted

retentionPeriods.name: Indefinitely
retentionPeriods.description: Data stored permanently until manually deleted

privacyActions.name: Full Access
privacyActions.description: Complete data sharing for best navigation features
privacyActions.recommendation: Use only when essential features needed

privacyActions.name: Anonymize
privacyActions.description: Remove personal identifiers, use random IDs

privacyActions.name: Delay Transmission
privacyActions.description: Buffer location data, send with 15-30min delay

privacyActions.name: On-Device Processing
privacyActions.description: All navigation processed locally, no server communication

privacyActions.name: Block All
privacyActions.description: No data sharing, offline maps only

services.name: Apple Maps
services.description: Privacy-oriented mainstream navigation with on-device processing

dataTypes.retention: Stays on device unless iCloud sync enabled
Anonymized after use, random identifiers used

privacyFeatures: Random identifiers instead of Apple ID
Location converted to less precise after 24hrs
Search history stays on device by default
services.dataFlowDiagram: Device ‚Üí Anonymized Random ID ‚Üí Apple Servers ‚Üí Aggregated Traffic

services.name: Google Maps
services.description: Feature-rich navigation with extensive data collection for personalization

dataTypes.retention: Stored in Google Account indefinitely unless deleted

dataTypes.user_control: Can enable Incognito Mode or delete history

privacyFeatures: Incognito Mode (prevents saving to account, but doesn't stop tracking)
privacyConcerns: Data tied to Google Account by default
Used for ad personalization across Google services
Incognito mode doesn't prevent Google from seeing location
services.dataFlowDiagram: Device ‚Üí Google Account ID ‚Üí Google Servers ‚Üí Ad Network ‚Üí Partners

services.name: OpenStreetMap (OSM)
services.description: Community-driven open map data with zero tracking by default

dataTypes.note: OSM itself collects NO user data

privacyFeatures: Zero user tracking by OpenStreetMap itself
No user profiles or accounts required
services.privacyWarning: OSM apps (Maps.me, OsmAnd, Organic Maps) may have their own tracking - check each app's privacy policy

recommendedApps.name: Maps.me
recommendedApps.privacy: Fair - may include ads and analytics

services.dataFlowDiagram: Device (Local Processing Only) ‚Üí No Server Communication

maxPrivacy.settings: Complete offline mode, no app analytics

balancedPrivacyAndFeatures.settings: Disable precise location when not needed, don't sync visited places

maxFeatures.settings: Enable Incognito Mode, disable Location History, use auto-delete
